definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: quake, shake, intr. (NH = BH, so Aram. r9ap (rare), and (once) [[רְשְַׁ]] toss, rage (of sea); Ar. ra9asa, usu. ra9i4a, ra9a4a (loan-word?), tremble, quiver, quake; cf. perhaps As. rêšu, exult);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[רָעֲשָׁה]] Je 8:16, Je 49:21, [[רָעָָשָׁה]] Ju Jdg 5:4, Ps 68:9; 3 pl. [[רָעֲשׁוּ]] Jn 2:10 +, etc. Impf. 3 ms. [[יִרְעַשׁ]] Ps 72:16, 3 fpl. [[תִּרְעַשְׁנׇה]] Ez Eze 26:10, etc.; Pt. pl. [[רׂעֲשִׁים]] Je 4:24;—quake, shake, of earth Ju Jdg 5:4 = Ps 68:9, 2Sa 22:8 (‖[[רגז]]) = Ps 18:8 (‖ id.), Ps 77:19 (+ [[רנז]]), also Is 13:13 (c. [[עַל־כֵּן]], + [[מִמְּקוֹמוֹ]], pregn.; ‖[[רָגַז ]]), Je 51:29; c. [[מִן]] caus. Je 8:16, Je 10:10, Je 49:21; of [[מוֹסְדֵי אָָרֶץ]] Is 24:18; of heavens Jn 2:10 ([[לִפְנֵי]] caus.; ‖[[רָגַז ]]); heavens and earth Jn 4:16; mts. Je 4:24, Na 1:5 ([[מִן]] pers. caus.), Ps 46:4 ([[ב]] caus.); walls Ez Eze 26:10 ([[מִן]] caus.); [[אִיִּים]] v:Eze 26:15 (id.); [[מִגְרשׁוֹת]] Eze 27:28 ([[ל]] caus.); [[הַסִּפִּים]] Am 9:1; all living things Ez Eze 38:20 ([[מִפָּנַי]] caus.); of waving grain Ps 72:16.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: [[נִרְעֲשָׁה הָאָרֶץ]] Je 50:46 is made to quake ([[מִקּוֹל]]).

cause to quake, subj. ´[[י]]:, c. acc. of heavens, earth, nations, etc., Hag 2:6, Hag 2:7, Hag 2:21, cf. Ps 60:4; nations + [[מִקּוֹל]] Ez Eze 31:16; subj. man, c. acc. of kingdoms Is 14:16 (‖[[מַרְגִּיז ]]).
cause (horse) to spring, leap (like locust), man subj., Job 39:20.
